titleStmt.title: Spiritual order and Christian liberty proved to be consistent in the Churches of Christ and impositions upon the consciences of believers in religious practices found to be antichristian and destructive to both / by R.G. a protestant.
titleStmt.author: Gordon, Robert, fl. 1669-1675.
